resources.string: Choose one of the features below.
This is the default content view for an activity. Be sure to change your activity\'s onCreate method. Use setContentView on a custom layout.
This app is a sample Dashboard pattern App

Welcome to BackTrack-PG 


Start Script intents to Android Terminal Emulator.
 
Have pfun and Hack The Planet with your Android :-)

su 
sleep 2 
cd /sdcard/backtrack 
echo Backtrack Android App by cr4shy http://security-is-just-an-illusion.blogspot.de 
sleep 10 
sh backtrack.sh
